__e: All right, so these girls... they picked you up?
Well, you're always getting it wrong.
You don't think they picked you because you're the right man for the job?
My parents chose a fiance for me when I was still a little girl.
And if they did, why didn't they choose a safer place to have their party last night?
My parents are here today, not because they are meant to be, but because they chose each other.
I mean, I know it's hard, but they chose a military life and to raise a child within it.
I've no idea why they picked me out... other than they thought I looked well different from the pack.
And how do they know they've chosen the right person, the one they're supposed to be with forever?
Just found out there's three to a room, and I was wondering if you guys have chosen a roomie yet.
It's, uh, what it takes to put a show on every week, and boy, did they pick a good week to come.
Oh! So you and some woman picked out a place for you and me?
In your case, I'm guessing they've already picked out the best wine to bring out your flavor.
I can't help it if they chose the one that makes the most sense.
Why she's named after her father instead of me, I don'!
Now, mum, why don't you tell what those two up there chose for everyone to cook tonight?
The name my mother and father chose for me...
And out of all those people, they chose not to pay me.
